title: New: Wet – Deadwater
content:
Having taken six weeks or so off from posting due to end of university / dissertation stress times, it feels good to be back, and there’s hardly a more fitting track to return with than the long anticipated major label debut of Wet.

Having demonstrated colossal potential on their 2013 EP, the trio are set to release their debut LP, Don’t You, via Columbia, and play a one-off London show at Dalston Victoria on 17 June, tickets available from tomorrow. Check out stunning new track, Deadwater, below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
